Subskills.name: Arcane Echoes
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Shadowflame Affliction
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict shadow burn on hit.

Subskills.name: Spirit Circle
Subskills.description: Restless spirits now orbit you for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Spiritual Expansion
Subskills.description: Increases the size of restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Wraiths Call
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Spectral Efficiency
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Phantom Step
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Hexbound Spirits
Subskills.description: Chance to summon orbiting souls at target location on hit dealing damage for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Feast on the Harvest
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of restless spirits according to the stack amount of harvest the damned consuming the buff.

Subskills.name: Wraiths Fury
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by restless spirits over time.

Subskills.name: Shattering Spirits
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Spectral Velocity
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Master of Spirits
Subskills.description: Summon multiple spirit servants following you and unleashing shadow bolts towards nearby monsters. Restless Spirits now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Soul Termination
Subskills.description: Restless spirits explode on hit dealing a portion of their damage as area of effect damage.
